items.title: Awesome Osint
items.content_text:

items.title: Awesome Godot
items.content_text:
### Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

*   [DotnetQuestSystem (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/TRUINGLol/DotnetQuestSystem) - A simple implementation of a quest system on .NET with an interface for Godot.
*   [Inventory Manager (‚≠ê19)](https://github.com/Rubonnek/inventory-manager) - Minimalistic inventory manager for easily adding and removing items with variable stack sizes and stack count limits.

### Other / Godot version unknown

*   [godot-launcher (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/sebastianoboem/godot-launcher) - A desktop application built with Python that simplifies the Godot Engine development environment management.
items.content_html:
Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

  • DotnetQuestSystem (‚≠ê11) - A simple implementation of a quest system on .NET with an interface for Godot.
  • Inventory Manager (‚≠ê19) - Minimalistic inventory manager for easily adding and removing items with variable stack sizes and stack count limits.

Other / Godot version unknown

  • godot-launcher (‚≠ê1) - A desktop application built with Python that simplifies the Godot Engine development environment management.

items.title: Awesome Smart Tv
items.content_text:
### Samsung Tizen / Other

*   \[TizenBrew] ([https://github.com/reisxd/TizenBrew (‚≠ê732)](https://github.com/reisxd/TizenBrew)) - A way to experience modded websites and you can install newer apps without fighting with Tizen Studio
*   \[TizenTube] ([https://github.com/reisxd/TizenTube (‚≠ê936)](https://github.com/reisxd/TizenTube)) - A TizenBrew module that enhances your favourite streaming websites viewing experience by removing ads and adding support for Sponsorblock.

items.title: Awesome Vue
items.content_text:
### Resources / External Resources

*   [State of Vue Report](https://www.monterail.com/stateofvue?utm_source=Github\&utm_medium=awesomevue) - The 5th edition of the most comprehensive Vue publication. Co-created with Evan You, the Vue & Nuxt Core Teams

### Resources / Tutorials

*   [Getting Started Internationalizing (i18n) with Intlayer and Vite and Vue](https://intlayer.org/doc/environment/vite-and-vue)

### Resources / Examples

*   [i18n boilerplate Intlayer + Vue 3 + Vite (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/aymericzip/intlayer-vite-vue-template)

### Components & Libraries / UI Components

*   [Vue Pivottable (‚≠ê146)](https://github.com/Seungwoo321/vue-pivottable) ‚Äì A Vue 2 port of the jQuery-based PivotTable.js.
*   [Vue3 Pivottable (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/vue-pivottable/vue3-pivottable) ‚Äì A Vue 3 port of the jQuery-based PivotTable.js.
*   [Vue Datamaps (‚≠ê19)](https://github.com/Seungwoo321/vue-datamaps) - Vue 2 port of the javascript-based DataMaps
*   [Vue DnD Kit (‚≠ê83)](https://github.com/zizigy/vue-dnd-kit) - A lightweight, performant drag and drop toolkit for Vue 3 with composable API, keyboard navigation, accessibility support, and advanced customization options. Supports any cases, and touch devices. Inspired by React DnD Kit

### Components & Libraries / UI Utilities

*   [regle (‚≠ê230)](https://github.com/victorgarciaesgi/regle) - ‚úÖ Headless form validation library for Vue.js.

### Components & Libraries / Utilities

*   [vue-intlayer (‚≠ê187)](https://github.com/aymericzip/intlayer) - Intlayer i18n solution for vue 3.
items.content_html:
Resources / External Resources

  • State of Vue Report - The 5th edition of the most comprehensive Vue publication. Co-created with Evan You, the Vue & Nuxt Core Teams

Resources / Tutorials

  • Getting Started Internationalizing (i18n) with Intlayer and Vite and Vue

Resources / Examples

  • i18n boilerplate Intlayer + Vue 3 + Vite (‚≠ê3)

Components & Libraries / UI Components

  • Vue Pivottable (‚≠ê146) ‚Äì A Vue 2 port of the jQuery-based PivotTable.js.
  • Vue3 Pivottable (‚≠ê7) ‚Äì A Vue 3 port of the jQuery-based PivotTable.js.
  • Vue Datamaps (‚≠ê19) - Vue 2 port of the javascript-based DataMaps
  • Vue DnD Kit (‚≠ê83) - A lightweight, performant drag and drop toolkit for Vue 3 with composable API, keyboard navigation, accessibility support, and advanced customization options. Supports any cases, and touch devices. Inspired by React DnD Kit

Components & Libraries / UI Utilities

  • regle (‚≠ê230) - ‚úÖ Headless form validation library for Vue.js.

Components & Libraries / Utilities

  • vue-intlayer (‚≠ê187) - Intlayer i18n solution for vue 3.

items.title: Static Analysis
items.content_text:
### Programming Languages / [Other](#other-1)

*   [rails\_best\_practices](https://rails-bestpractices.com) ‚Äî A code metric tool for Rails projects

### Other / [Other](#other-1)

*   [cargo-bloat (‚≠ê2.6k)](https://github.com/RazrFalcon/cargo-bloat) :warning: ‚Äî Find out what takes most of the space in your executable. supports ELF (Linux, BSD), Mach-O (macOS) and PE (Windows) binaries.
*   [LunaSec](https://github.com/marketplace/lunatrace-by-lunasec/) :warning: ‚Äî Open Source AppSec platform that automatically notifies you the next time vulnerabilities like Log4Shell or node-ipc happen. Track your dependencies and builds in a centralized service.

### Multiple languages / [Other](#other-1)

*   [keploy](https://keploy.io/) ‚Äî Keploy is an open-source testing platform that helps developers automate and streamline their testing process. It provides API, and integration testing agents, generating tests, mocks/stubs for APIs that actually work. Additionally, Keploy offers an AI-powered Unit Testing Agent that generates stable, useful unit tests directly in your GitHub PRs and in VSCode, helping catch errors and improve code quality.
items.content_html:
Programming Languages / Other

  • rails_best_practices ‚Äî A code metric tool for Rails projects

Other / Other

  • cargo-bloat (‚≠ê2.6k) ‚ö†Ô∏è ‚Äî Find out what takes most of the space in your executable. supports ELF (Linux, BSD), Mach-O (macOS) and PE (Windows) binaries.
  • LunaSec ‚ö†Ô∏è ‚Äî Open Source AppSec platform that automatically notifies you the next time vulnerabilities like Log4Shell or node-ipc happen. Track your dependencies and builds in a centralized service.

Multiple languages / Other

  • keploy ‚Äî Keploy is an open-source testing platform that helps developers automate and streamline their testing process. It provides API, and integration testing agents, generating tests, mocks/stubs for APIs that actually work. Additionally, Keploy offers an AI-powered Unit Testing Agent that generates stable, useful unit tests directly in your GitHub PRs and in VSCode, helping catch errors and improve code quality.

items.title: Free for Dev
items.content_text:
### Monitoring

*   [fivenines.io](https://fivenines.io/) ‚Äî Linux server monitoring with real‚Äëtime dashboards and alerting ‚Äî‚ÄØfree forever for up to‚ÄØ5‚ÄØmonitored servers at 60-seconds interval. No credit card required.
items.content_html:
Monitoring

items.title: Awesome Developer First
items.content_text:
### Authentication & Identity

*   [Unkey](https://www.unkey.com/) - Authentication, rate limiting and usage analytics for APIs. [![unkey](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/unkeyed/unkey?style=flat-square\&logo=github\&labelColor=%230D1117\&color=%23161B22)](https://github.com/stack-auth/stack) [![featured on launchweek.dev](https://img.shields.io/badge/featured-0D1117.svg?style=flat-square\&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://launchweek.dev/lw/2024#06)

### Documentation

*   [Fern](https://www.buildwithfern.com/) - Instant docs and SDKs for APIs.

### Localization

*   [Lingo](https://lingo.dev/) - AI localization infrastructure. [![LW24 participant](https://img.shields.io/badge/featured-LW24-8957E5.svg?style=flat-square\&labelColor=0D1117\&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://launchweek.dev/lw/2024/mega#participants)

### Misc

*   [Trophy](https://trophy.so) - APIs for gamified product experiences.
items.content_html:
Authentication & Identity

  • Unkey - Authentication, rate limiting and usage analytics for APIs.

Documentation

  • Fern - Instant docs and SDKs for APIs.

Localization

  • Lingo - AI localization infrastructure.

Misc

  • Trophy - APIs for gamified product experiences.

items.title: Awesome Embedded Rust
items.content_text:
### Community / Community Chat Rooms

*   [#mspm0-rs:matrix.org](https://matrix.to/#/#mspm0-rs:matrix.org) - For discussion of using Embedded Rust on Texas Instruments MSPM0 (and MSPS003) devices.

### Tools / Paid and commercially available materials

*   [commitment-issues (‚≠ê11)](https://github.com/dysonltd/commitment-issues) Compile git metadata into your binary.

### Peripheral Access Crates / Texas Instruments

*   [`mspm0-metapac`](https://github.com/mspm0-rs/mspm0-data)
    *   PAC for all MSPM0 (and MSPS003) microcontrollers. (generated using chiptool)

### HAL implementation crates / Texas Instruments

*   [`embassy-mspm0`](https://github.com/embassy-rs/embassy/tree/main/embassy-mspm0)
    *   Embassy HAL implementation for all MSPM0 (and MSPS003) microcontrollers.

### Driver crates / WIP

*   [tmag5273 (‚≠ê10)](https://github.com/dysonltd/tmag5273) - Cross-platform no\_std compatible i2c library for 3-axis Hall Effect sensor.
*   [paa5100je-pwm3901 (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/dysonltd/paa5100je-pwm3901) - Cross platform no-std compatible spi async library for an Optical Flow Sensor.
items.content_html:
Community / Community Chat Rooms

  • #mspm0-rs:matrix.org - For discussion of using Embedded Rust on Texas Instruments MSPM0 (and MSPS003) devices.

Tools / Paid and commercially available materials

  • commitment-issues (‚≠ê11) Compile git metadata into your binary.

Peripheral Access Crates / Texas Instruments

  • mspm0-metapac
    • PAC for all MSPM0 (and MSPS003) microcontrollers. (generated using chiptool)

HAL implementation crates / Texas Instruments

  • embassy-mspm0
    • Embassy HAL implementation for all MSPM0 (and MSPS003) microcontrollers.

Driver crates / WIP

  • tmag5273 (‚≠ê10) - Cross-platform no_std compatible i2c library for 3-axis Hall Effect sensor.
  • paa5100je-pwm3901 (‚≠ê2) - Cross platform no-std compatible spi async library for an Optical Flow Sensor.

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Documentation tools / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [angular-latest-snippets (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/JMGomes/angular-latest-snippets) - Comprehensive Angular v19 [snippets](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=JMGomes.angular-latest-snippets) for TypeScript and HTML, including support for the latest Angular features. This extension was created to bridge the gap in resources for Angular‚Äôs newest capabilities, most existing code snippets are quite outdated.

### HTTP / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-drupal8-rest (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/wnabil/ngx-drupal8-rest) - Drupal 8 rest module for Angular applications.

### Mixed utilities / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [@shanieMoonlight/moonlight-repo (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/shanieMoonlight/moonlight-repo) - This monorepo contains a collection of open source Angular libraries and utilities developed by SpiderBaby, along with demo applications showcasing their usage.

### Inspired by Angular / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [use-vue-service (‚≠ê4)](https://github.com/kaokei/use-vue-service) - Lightweight Vue 3 state management with dependency injection, inspired by Angular services.
items.content_html:
Documentation tools / Google Developer Experts

  • angular-latest-snippets (‚≠ê2) - Comprehensive Angular v19 snippets for TypeScript and HTML, including support for the latest Angular features. This extension was created to bridge the gap in resources for Angular‚Äôs newest capabilities, most existing code snippets are quite outdated.

HTTP / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-drupal8-rest (‚≠ê3) - Drupal 8 rest module for Angular applications.

Mixed utilities / Google Developer Experts

  • @shanieMoonlight/moonlight-repo (‚≠ê1) - This monorepo contains a collection of open source Angular libraries and utilities developed by SpiderBaby, along with demo applications showcasing their usage.

Inspired by Angular / Google Developer Experts

  • use-vue-service (‚≠ê4) - Lightweight Vue 3 state management with dependency injection, inspired by Angular services.
